Text: gas schedulerHeres my resume Thanks taking the time to look over it I am very eager to work at Enron and learn more about the energy industry As you can tell from my resume I dont have the typical business background however I am willing to learn and thrive on challenging situations I have actually interviewed with you before for this type of position and look forward to meeting you again Thanks again Mike Montgomery Resumedoc
